author: Shoumojit Banerjee
text:
A 19-year-old student of a college here was raped and robbed of her valuables on a hillock near the campus on Wednesday.

According to the police, the student used to frequent the area, popularly known as ‘Hanuman Tekdi,’ for evening walks and outdoor study. The area is frequented by health enthusiasts and students.

The girl had set out with a book in hand that day when she was accosted by a youth who appeared to be in his late 20s. He took her forcibly to a lonely spot, raped her and then fled with her phone and valuables.

The victim, who hails from another State, brought the matter to the notice of college authorities, who arranged for counselling. A case was lodged at the Chatturshrungi police station against an unidentified assailant under Sections 376 (rape) and 354 (assault or criminal force to woman with intent to outrage her modesty) of the Indian Penal Code.
title: College student raped in Pune
